summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Fairview Avenue North, from Fuhrman Avenue to Allison Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12917 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
